fpRules.rule5: Include at least one special character @,#,$,%,&,^,-

chequeBookDetails.collectionPeriodText:
The authorized person (or company representative) must visit the selected branch to receive the cheque book within 2 months from the request date.
If the cheque book is not collected within this period, it will be automatically terminated.
requiredDocs: An official delegation letter authorizing them to receive the cheque book on behalf of the company
